amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to conduct a study on drug court programs that conduct hearings in nontraditional public places, such as schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-387 to ensure that the effects of illicit drug abuse on children of substance abusers are considered in the annual National Drug Control Strategy. The amendment requires ONDCP to conduct a study and the President to report to Congress on drug court programs that conduct hearings in nontraditional public places, such as schools.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boozman amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
